name: Cave Digger 2 Dig Harder
summary: Go on a mysterious journey to the wildlands in this 1-4-player action-adventure game inspired by Western, Dieselpunk and Lovecraftian themes! Follow the path of legendary adventurer Clayton to explore old mines, nautical caves, and ruins of ancient civilizations, and unravel the secrets of the valleys. But beware! Best to always keep a six-shooter nearby just in case.
